high_descs: Turn around to face the counter top in front of the toaster.
Pick up the yellow knife from the counter top.
Turn around and go to the right to face the end of the counter.
Slice the bread on the table.
Continue to face the table.
Place the knife on top of the table.
Continue to face the table.
Pick up a slice of the bread.
Turn to the right and go straight to face the microwave.
Open the microwave, place the bread inside, close the microwave, wait a second, open the microwave, pick up the bread, and close the microwave.
Move to the left to face the counter in front of the microwave.
Place the slice of bread on the counter.
tasks.task_desc: Place the microwaved slice of bread on the counter in front of the toaster.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the toaster.
Pick up the knife with the yellow handle.
Turn around then walk then face right.
Slice the bread into slices.
Look up farther on the counter.
Place the knife down near the edge of the counter.
Look back down to the sliced bread.
Grab a slice of the bread.
Turn left and walk to the stove and look up at the microwave.
Warm the bread for 2 seconds.
Turn left and walk to face the toaster on the right.
Place the toast on the counter in front of the other knife.
tasks.task_desc: Place a warm slice of bread on the counter.

high_descs: Walk towards the counter
Grab yellow knife from counter
Walk with the knife towards the table
Slice bread on the table
Look up from the table
Put knife on the table
Look down from the table
Grab a bread slice from the table
Walk with the bread slice towards the microwave
Put the bread slice in the microwave, cook it and take it out
Walk with the bread slice towards the counter
Put the bread slice on the counter
tasks.task_desc: Slice bread, grab a slice, cook it in the microwave, put it on the counter.

high_descs: Take a step ahead and turn right to the sink.
Pick up the apple on the left part of the sink.
Turn left and walk to the wall, then turn left to face the microwave.
Heat the apple in the microwave.
Turn left and walk back to the sink.
Place the apple in the sink basin in front of the other apple.
tasks.task_desc: Place a heated apple in a sink.

high_descs: Proceed to area to the left of the sink on your right.  Turn right to face sink.
Pick up apple from counter, to the right of the sponge and spoon.
Turn left, go to wall.  Turn left, go to oven and microwave.
Open microwave door, place apple to right of mug, close door.  Wait three seconds, open microwave door, remove apple, close door.
Turn left, proceed to sink on right, turn left to face sink.
Place apple in sink below other apple.
tasks.task_desc: Pick up apple, warm in microwave, put apple in sink.

high_descs: Turn to the right and face the sink.
Pick up the apple from the cover on the left side of the sink.
Carry the apple and turn to the left, then left again to find the microwave.
Open the microwave and place the apple inside. Shut the door and then open it again and take the apple out. Shut the door.
Hold the apple and turn to the left.  Face the sink on the left side.
Place the apple inside the sink on the right side.
tasks.task_desc: Heat an apple and place it in the sink.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the counter top to the left of the stove.
Pick up the tomato behind the soap dispenser, on the counter.
Move over to the left of the counter top.
Place the tomato to the left of the knife on the counter top.
Pick up the tomato to the right of the tomato.
Cut the tomato into slices.
Place the knife back on the counter top, to the left of the tomato.
Pick up one of the tomato slices.
Turn to your left and go to the sink at the end of the counter, on your left.
Place the tomato slice in the right sink, turn the water on, rinse off the tomato slice, and remove the tomato slice from the sink.
Turn to your left and go to the microwave, above the stove, on your left, at the end of the kitchen.
Place the tomato slice in the microwave.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean tomato slice in the microwave.

high_descs: Turn around and move to the counter space to the right of the stove.
Pick up the tomato from the counter.
Carry the tomato a step to the left, still facing the counter.
Place the tomato on the counter.
Pick up the sharp knife with the yellow handle from the counter.
Use the knife to slice the tomato.
Place the knife on the counter to the left of the tomato.
Pick up a slice of tomato from the counter.
Turn left to carry the tomato slice towards the fridge, but then turn left to face the sinks just before the fridge.
Place the tomato slice in the right sink, turn on the water, and then move once rinsed.
Turn left and carry the tomato slice to the wall, then turn your body left to face the microwave.
Place the tomato slice in the microwave.
tasks.task_desc: Put a slice of washed tomato in the microwave.

high_descs: Turn around, take a step forward, turn left and take a step toward the table, turn right and walk toward the counter with the toaster.
Pick up the tomato.
Take a step to the left in front of the spoon and knife.
Put down the tomato in between the knife and the spoon.
Pick up the knife.
Slice the tomato.
Put the knife down next to the spoon.
Pick up the tomato.
Turn left and walk to the sink.  Turn right an face the sink.
Put the tomato slice down in the right sink.  Wash the tomato slice by turning the water on.  After the water drains, pick up the tomato slice.
Turn left and walk to the wall.  At the wall, turn left and face the oven.  Look up at the microwave.
Put tomato slice in the microwave to the right of the apple.  Close the door.
tasks.task_desc: Slice a tomato, wash it, and place in microwave to be heated.

high_descs: Turn left, walk straight to the end cabinet
Grab the spatula on the counter
Turn around to the sink
Put the spatula in the sink
tasks.task_desc: Move the spatula from the counter to the sink

high_descs: walk forwards and turn left to go down the kitchen isle, then turn right to face the kitchen counter to the right of the fridge
grab the spatula off of the counter top there
turn around and walk to the kitchen sink ahead
place the spatula inside of the sink
tasks.task_desc: place a spatula inside of the sink

high_descs: Walk to the left to the spatula on the counter top to the left of the stove.
Pick up the spatula from the counter top.
Turn around and walk slightly forward to the sink.
Put the spatula in the sink basin.
tasks.task_desc: Move a spatula from a counter top to a sink.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the wall then turn left and take a step so you are close to and facing the counter.
Pick up the mug that's under the coffee maker's spout.
Turn left and walk to the wall then turn left to face the microwave.
Warm the mug up in the microwave and take it back out and close the door.
Back up one step and take a half step to your left.
Put the mug in the cabinet that's above the microwave and close the door.

high_descs: Move the the counter right of the sink.
Pick up the mug from the coffee machine.
Bring the mug to the microwave.
Heat the mug in the microwave.
Bring the heated mug to the cabinet above the microwave.
Put the heated mug in the cabinet above the microwave.

high_descs: Turn left and walk all the way to the wall and face left.
Pick up the mug out of the coffee maker.
Turn around and walk to the wall. Face the microwave on the left.
Heat the mug in the microwave.
Look up at the cabinet.
Place the mug in the right side of the cabinet.

high_descs: Turn left and go to the wall, then turn right and look down to face the cabinet below.
Open the cabinet and take out the kettle from inside.
Turn around and step forward, then turn left and go forward, then turn right to go to the sink.
Clean the kettle inside of the sink.
Turn around to face the cabinets.
Open the left cabinet beneath the counter, and put the kettle inside.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean kettle in the cabinet.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the cabinets on the far right.
Open the bottom cabinet next to the wall and take out the kettle.
Turn around and walk to the sink.
Wash the kettle in the sink.
Turn around.
Open the cabinet under and to the left of the stove and place the kettle in it.
tasks.task_desc: Place a clean kettle in a cabinet.

high_descs: Turn to the left and then face the cabinet on the right.
Open the bottom cabinet and take out the tea pot.
Carry the tea pot and turn around, then right to face the sink.
Place the tea pot in the sink and turn on the water. Turn off the water and pick up the tea pot.
Hold the tea pot and turn around to face the counter.
Open the bottom left cabinet and place the tea pot inside.
tasks.task_desc: Rinse a tea pot and place it in a cabinet.

pick up the sharp knife with the yellow handle from the mat that is to the left of the sink
facing the mat, locate the tomato on the mat

turn around and face the lower cabinet that is to the left of the cook top
open the door, put the knife in to the cabinet and close the door

move to the left to face the counter that is to the left of the microwave
put the slice of the tomato on to the counter to the left of the white plate

Step closer to the sink

Place the tomato slice in the sink, to the right of the knife, turn the water on, rinse the tomato slice off, turn the water off, and remove the tomato slice from the sink.

Put the mug on a shelf in the fridge and close the door, then take the mug back out and re-close the fridge.

Reach forward and put the mug on the back right corner of the table.

high_descs: Turn left for one step, turn right for seven steps, and turn right to face the stove.

Turn right for two steps, turn left for two steps and stop at the sink.

Stand the knife in the sink with the blade down, on the left side of the sink near the drain.
Take a slice out from the middle of the tomato.

Put the slice in the sink aligned with the blade of the knife, standing up with the end towards the front, turn on the water and rinse the tomato and knife. Then take out the tomato after the water drains.

Open the door of the microwave above, put the tomato slice in the microwave to the right of the egg, standing up and facing out, then shut the door.

tasks.task_desc: fill the bowl from the top cabinet with water, put it on the counter

high_descs: Turn around and face the kitchen counter originally to your right
Open the kitchen cabinet and take out a bowl that was inside
Turn to your left and then face the kitchen sink
Place the bowl in the sink, rinse the bowl and then pick it back up
Turn to your left and head back to the kitchen cabinet
Place the clean bowl on the kitchen counter
tasks.task_desc: Grab a bowl, wash it, set it on the counter

high_descs: Turn left and go past the loaf of bread on the counter then turn right to face the counter
Pick up the spoon from the front of the counter
Turn left and go past the cooktop then turn left and go to the sink
Put the spoon in the sink and turn on the water, then turn off the water and take the spoon out of the sink
Turn left and go to the end of the counter, then turn left and go to the counter to the right of the cooktop
Put the spoon on top of the spatula on the counter
tasks.task_desc: Put a cleaned spoon on top of a spatula in front of a loaf of bread on the counter

high_descs: Turn left and walk forward slightly, then turn right towards the spoon on the counter top near the large knife and spatula.
Pick up the spoon from the counter.
Turn around and walk to the right to the sink.
Put the spoon in the sink, rinse it off, and take it out of the sink.
Turn left, walk to the end of the counter, then turn left towards the bread on the other counter.
Put the spoon on that counter, on top of the spatula that is touching the bread.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cleaned spoon on top of a spatula on a counter top.

high_descs: Turn to the left and face the counter on the right.
Pick up the spoon directly beside the stove on the right.
Carry the spoon and turn to the left and face the sink on the left.
Place the spoon in the sink and turn on the water. Turn off the water and pick up the spoon.
Carry the spoon and turn to the left and the left again at the counter.
Place the spoon on the counter, on top of the spatula that is on the front edge.
tasks.task_desc: Rinse a spoon and place it on the counter.

high_descs: Turn around to face the kitchen island
Pick up the green cup near the corner of the island
Turn right and walk to the fridge
Put the cup into the fridge then remove it
Turn left and walk back up to the kitchen island
Put the cup down on the right edge of the kitchen island
tasks.task_desc: Put the chilled cup on the kitchen island

high_descs: Turn around and go to the the center island.
Pick up the green cup on the right.
Turn around and bring the cup to the fridge.
Chill the cup in the fridge.
Bring the cup to the island on the left.
Put the cup on the island.
tasks.task_desc: Put a chilled cup on the island.

high_descs: Turn around and face the table.
Pick up the green cup closest to you.
Turn right towards the fridge.
Place the cup inside the fridge to cool it up and take it back out.
Turn left and face the counter to your left.
Place the cup back on the counter.
tasks.task_desc: Cool down one of the green cups on the counter.

high_descs: Turn around to face the counter.
Pick up the green glass that is in the front of the counter.
Take the glass and turn around and to the left to face the fridge.
Open the fridge and put the glass inside. Shut the door. Open the fridge and take the glass out, and then shut the door.
Carry the glass and turn to the left back towards the counter.
Place the glass on the right side edge of the counter.
tasks.task_desc: Chill a glass and place it on the counter.

high_descs: Turn left and take a step forward, then turn left to face the wooden table.
Pick up the closest green cup off of the wooden table.
Turn around and begin walking forward, then turn left to face the fridge.
Open the fridge and put the green cup inside on the second shelf from the top, then close the door, after a couple seconds open the fridge back up, remove the green cup, and close the fridge door.
Turn left and begin walking forward, then look up at the wooden table.
Put the chilled green cup onto the back right edge of the wooden table.
tasks.task_desc: Put a chilled green cup on a wooden table.

high_descs: Turn left to face the sink
Pick up the spoon from the counter behind the sink
Look down slightly to face toward the sink
Wash the spoon under water in the sink then remove it
Turn around and walk up to the counter right of the stove
Put the spoon down on the counter
tasks.task_desc: Put the washed spoon on the kitchen counter

high_descs: Walk forward and turn left towards the sink.
Pick up the spoon on the counter which is closest to you.
Bend down towards the sink.
Put the spoon in the sink, rinse it off, and take it back out.
Turn left and walk to the end of the counter, then turn left towards the other counter.
Put the spoon on the counter, to the left of the large knife.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cleaned spoon on a counter top.

high_descs: Take a step forward and face the sink on the left.
Pick up the spoon from behind the sink.
Bring the spoon closer to the sink.
Place the spoon in the sink and turn on the water. Turn of the water and pick up the spoon.
Take the spoon and move to the left and face the counter on the right.
Place the spoon on the counter, to the left of the toaster.
tasks.task_desc: Rinse a spoon and move it to the counter.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the left side of the sink.
Pick up the potato that is to the left of the apple and to the right of the spoon.
With the potato in your hand turn and go to the microwave.
Open the microwave and place the potato on the right side.  Close the door and start the microwave. When finished open the door and grab the potato.
With the potato in hand go to the counter top to the right of the stove.
Place the potato in between the white coffee mug and the spatula.
tasks.task_desc: Warm up a potato and place on the counter.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the sink on the left.
Pick up the potato to the left of the sink.
Turn left and then veer left to the microwave.
Heat the potato in the microwave.
Take a step left.
Place the potato on the counter, to the left and ahead of the mug.
tasks.task_desc: Place a heated potato on a counter.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the left side of the sink.
Pick up the potato from behind the sponge.
Walk to the microwave above the oven.
Put the potato in the microwave, heat up the potato, take the potato out of the microwave.
Walk to the counter to the left of the oven with the toaster on it.
Put the potato down on the counter to the left of the white mug.
tasks.task_desc: To heat a potato and put it down on the counter.

high_descs: Turn around and walk towards the wall, then walk up to the sink.
Pick up the egg off of the island to the left of the sink.
Turn left and walk over to the wall, then turn left and look up at the microwave.
Put the egg in the microwave and close the door then turn on the microwave, after a couple seconds open the microwave and take out the egg then close the microwave door.
Turn left and walk forward, then turn right to face the counter.
Put the heated egg on the counter in front of the large metal knife.
tasks.task_desc: Put a heated egg on the counter.

high_descs: Walk to the kitchen sink on your left.
Grab an egg from the sink.
Walk to the microwave on your right.
Put the egg in the microwave, then take it out.
Go to the kitchen counter to the left of the microwave.
Place the egg on the counter.
tasks.task_desc: Heat an egg and put it on a counter.

high_descs: go to the sink
pick u the egg from the sink
take the egg to the microwave
warm in the microwave
take the cooked egg to the counter where the bread is
put the egg on the counter
tasks.task_desc: cook and egg and put it on the counter

high_descs: Turn to your left head to the stove counter
Pick up the egg beside the kettle on the counter
Turn around to your left, walk straight then turn right facing the microwave
Open the microwave heat the egg inside, pick it up then close the door
Turn to your left walk straight and face the sink
Put the egg beside the apple in the sink
tasks.task_desc: Put the warm egg in the sink

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the counter by the stove.
Pick up the egg on the counter to the left of the stove.
Turn around and walk to the microwave.
Put the egg in the microwave, turn it on and cook the egg, then remove it from the microwave.
Turn to your left and walk to the sink.
Put the egg in the sink next to the tomato.
tasks.task_desc: Put an egg in the sink with a tomato.

high_descs: Go left and then right to face the fork and knife on the counter.
Pick the egg up from the counter.
Turn around and go to the right to stand in front of the microwave.
Put the egg in the microwave and turn it on and then take the egg out and shut the door.
Go left and then turn to the left to stand in front of the sink.
Put the egg in the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put a warmed egg in the sink.

high_descs: turn right and walk over to the kitchen island sink on the right
grab an apple off of the kitchen sink on the left
turn left and walk over to the microwave over on the left side corner of the room ahead
place the apple inside of the microwave, then turn it on and take it back out
turn left and walk over to the kitchen sink again on the left towards the end of the room
place the apple down inside of the sink on the right side sink
tasks.task_desc: place a microwaved apple inside of the sink

high_descs: Turn right and walk forward, then turn right and walk up to the wooden island.
Pick up the tomato that is to the left of the sink on the island.
Turn left and walk over to the wall, then turn left and look up at the microwave.
Put the apple in the microwave and microwave it for a couple seconds, then take it out and close the microwave.
Turn left and walk over to the kitchen sink.
Put the heated apple into the kitchen sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put a heated apple in the sink.

high_descs: Turn right and face the sink
Pick up the apple on the left side of the sink
Turn left then head to the microwave on your left
Open the microwave heat up the apple,take it out then close the microwave
Turn left and head back to the sink
Put the apple in the sink
tasks.task_desc: Put the heated apple in the sink

high_descs: Turn right to near the toaster.
Pick up the tomato off of the counter.
Go to the microwave on the right.
Open the microwave, heat the tomato and take the tomato out.
Turn left and take the tomato to the sink.
Set the tomato in the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Heat the tomato and set it in the sink.

high_descs: Move to the counter space to the right of the cook top
Pick up a tomato from the counter
Move to the microwave to the right of you
Heat the tomato in the  microwave and retrieve it closing the door
Move to the sink across from the cook top
Place the tomato inside the sink
tasks.task_desc: Put a heated tomato in the sink.

high_descs: Turn to the right and go to the counter where the toaster is.
Pick up the tomato that is on the counter next to the toaster.
Go to the right and raise the tomato up to the microwave.
Put the tomato in the microwave, turn it on to cook, remove the tomato when it is done cooking.
Turn to the left, go forward, turn to the sink that will be on the left.
Put the cooked tomato in the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put a cooked tomato in a sink.

high_descs: turn left and walk to the end of the kitchen counter space on your left
pick up the egg off of the kitchen counter there
move to the right a bit to face the microwave above the oven in the wall on your left
place the egg inside of the microwave, cook that egg for a bit, then take that egg back out from the microwave
turn left and walk over to the right side counter space to the right of the stove
place the egg back down on the counter there
tasks.task_desc: place a microwaved egg on the kitchen counter space

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the counter near the cook top range on the left.
Pick up the egg to the left of the toaster on the counter.
Turn around and walk to the microwave above the stove on the left.
Put the egg inside the microwave, heat it, remove it and close the door.
Turn left and walk to the counter near the cook top on the right.
Put the heated egg to the left of the green sponge on the counter.
tasks.task_desc: Place a heated egg on a counter.

high_descs: Turn and go to the counter by the stove.
Pick up an egg on the counter by the stove.
Turn and go to the microwave.
Heat the egg in the microwave.
Turn and go to the counter by the stove.
Put the egg on the counter by the stove.
tasks.task_desc: Put a microwaved egg on the counter by the stove.
